com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.sm.states

Class Rakp3Waiting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.sm.states.State
      • com.veraxsystems.vxipmi.sm.states.Rakp3Waiting

  • public class Rakp3Waiting
extends State
    At this point of session challenge, RAKP Message 3 was sent, StateMachine is waiting for RAKP Message 4.
    Transition to:
  • Rakp3Complete on DefaultAck
  • Authcap on Timeout
